system.effect:
Increase Psy Rating by 1, talent can be taken multiple times, ranging from 1 to 10, new psyker characters usually start at 2. If using Minor Psychic Powers, have a number of them equal to Half Willpower Bonus.
For Only War: Cost to upgrade is New Psy Rating x 200xp. EG: To upgrade from Psy Rating 3 from 2, pay 600xp (3x200xp)
For Black Crusade: Cannot purchase Psy Rating (X) above Character's Willpower Bonus + Corruption Bonus

If using Minor Psychic Powers, have a number of them equal to Half Willpower Bonus. For Only War: Cost to upgrade is New Psy Rating x 200xp. EG: To upgrade from Psy Rating 3 from 2, pay 600xp (3x200xp) For Black Crusade: Cannot purchase Psy Rating (X) above Character's Willpower Bonus + Corruption Bonus
